title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Nick Wright on Belichick's Bills Beating, Mahomes, Dave Wannstedt on Replacing Big Ben, Mario to The U, NFL Pick of the Year
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Nick Wright on Belichick's Bills Beating, Mahomes, Dave Wannstedt on Replacing Big Ben, Mario to The U, NFL Pick of the Year
description:
It's the best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast! First, Colin's top takes of the week, including why Bill Belichick and Nick Saban's careers are the perfect pushback for haters bashing the recent college coaching carousel, which new CFB coaching hire has the biggest challenge ahead, and why Tua has proven him both right and wrong (3:00). Then, Nick Wright (co-host of FS1's "First Things First") joins to discuss Colin's theory on relationships and what it means for Mac Jones and the Patriots (11:00), what the Patriots win over the Bills showed us about Bill Belichick's mentality (16:00), and if Patrick Mahomes will bounce back from looking like a mere mortal (18:00). Next, FOX NFL analyst and former Bears & Dolphins HC Dave Wannstedt and Colin discuss what the Steelers should do to replace Big Ben if he retires after this season (29:00), why Brian Kelly bolted from Notre Dame to LSU (32:00), and why Mario Cristobal can bring back The U (37:00). Finally, The Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his week 14 Bills/Buccaneers "Bet of the Year" (41:00), and Ravens/Browns (44:00), picks are "sharp" or "square".

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!
